post_title: FS/FT: T206 Cobb Red Portrait PSA 3 - TRADED
post_content:
***TRADED*** I have a beautiful T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait with a Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 42 Overprint back in PSA 3. It's nicely centered, with great color and perfect registration. I'd like to trade it for one of a couple things (+/- cash as needed):

-T227 Cobb (Miner’s or Honest Long Cut) in PSA/SGC 2-3  
-T206 Cobb Green or Bat Off in PSA/SGC 1-1.5 with high front eye appeal, plus cash
-E95 or E90-2  or Cracker Jack Honus Wagner PSA/SGC 1-2 
-1934 Goudey Hank Greenberg or Lou Gehrig PSA/SGC 4+
-Other offers in that vein, worst I can say is no. Smaller card + cash is always interesting. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2nuXR4w][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52179942760_5004893b75_z.jpg[/img][/url] [url=https://flic.kr/p/2nuQ5J5][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52178427832_8ecfedf77c_z.jpg[/img][/url]
Trade offers expanded and a cash price added. Thanks.
Price dropped, more trades added. Get yourself a beautiful Cobb without spending all of your cash.
Got a couple nice offers, but not quite the right fit yet. Keep 'em coming fellas.
